mapper.select: select * from favorite order by movieSeq asc
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO favorite (num, id, movieId, movieSeq, repRlsDate, genre, title, posters) VALUES(Favorite_Seq.NEXTVAL, #{id}, #{movieId}, #{movieSeq}, #{repRlsDate}, #{genre}, #{title}, #{posters})
mapper.update: DELETE FROM favorite WHERE movieSeq=#{movieSeq, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
